nodes.bodyText: That's just a minor thing, but I would remove the brackets around IsMapContaining.hasKey(..) to make the code more readable.
The static method import org.hamcrest.collection.IsMapContaining.hasKey is never used. You're referring to the IsMapContaining class in the test code.
